chunks.zh: 我就想问下,论坛是不是只有我一个没有贡献哪吒票房的
chunks.en: I just want to ask, am I the only one on the forum who hasn't contributed to the Nezha box office?

chunks.zh: 主要是对这类电影不感兴趣,此外也好几年没看电影了.
chunks.en: Mainly because I'm not interested in this type of movie, and also I haven't watched a movie in years.

chunks.zh: 你是电你是光，你是唯一的神话。
chunks.en: You are electricity, you are light, you are the only myth.

chunks.zh: 不要跟风去看电影或者去说你不看电影。这很 chun 。
chunks.en: Don't blindly follow the crowd to watch movies or say you don't watch movies. That's very 'chun' (naive/foolish).

chunks.zh: 笑死，政治力量又冲到评论区了
chunks.en: LOL, the political forces have rushed into the comment section again.

chunks.zh: 没错，你就是那个独一无二的存在，众人皆醉你独醒的代表，万古大道有了你才存在意义
chunks.en: That's right, you are the unique existence, the representative of 'I am the only one sober while everyone else is drunk', the eternal path only has meaning because of you.

chunks.zh: 我觉得选择看和不看，看完之后是夸奖还是批评都是很好的，这个世界本来就应该容得下不同的声音，好好表达就行了；但才 20+楼，总有人要摆出一副众人皆醉我独醒的姿态讲话，我只能当你是🤡
chunks.en: I think it's fine to choose to watch or not to watch, and it's fine to praise or criticize after watching. This world should be able to accommodate different voices, just express them well; but with only 20+ comments, some people want to put on an attitude of 'I am the only one sober while everyone else is drunk', I can only treat you as a clown 🤡.

chunks.zh: 观影人次 2 亿人，就算都只看一次还有近 12 亿没有看呢，肯定不止你一个。
chunks.en: 200 million people have watched it, and even if they only watched it once, there are still nearly 1.2 billion who haven't watched it, so you're definitely not the only one.

chunks.zh: 但闲得蛋疼「就我没看的」那除了你就没几个了。
chunks.en: But if you're bored enough to say 'I'm the only one who hasn't watched it', then there are probably very few people besides you.

chunks.zh: 这要是在游民星空，你这种标题高低得被喷个十几楼。
chunks.en: If this were in GamerSky, your title would definitely be flamed for dozens of comments.

chunks.zh: 不过说实话我也不喜欢，我记得小时候看过的奈克斯特奥特曼和数码宝贝，确实是上乘的作品，以至于我对现在的这些定位全年龄或者儿童向的作品要求很高，很难喜欢上。
chunks.en: But to be honest, I don't like it either. I remember Ultraman Nexus and Digimon that I watched when I was a kid were indeed excellent works, so I have very high requirements for these all-ages or children-oriented works now, and it's hard to like them.

chunks.zh: 人心中的成见是一座大山
chunks.en: Prejudice in people's hearts is a mountain.

chunks.zh: @xiaozecn 我看过甚至觉得里面的有些桥段都在暗讽政府，你没看觉得是政府推动的。
chunks.en: @xiaozecn I've seen it and even think some of the scenes are subtly mocking the government, while you haven't seen it and think it's promoted by the government.

chunks.zh: 这是近五年我唯一买票看的电影，我觉得还是不错的，就像黑猴一样，本来某个领域水平很差，突然来了个水准之上的产品，肯定会卖爆的。
chunks.en: This is the only movie I've bought a ticket to see in the past five years. I think it's pretty good. It's like Black Myth: Wukong, where the level in a certain field was very poor, and suddenly a product above the standard appeared, it will definitely sell well.

chunks.zh: 和战狼长津湖这种还是有很大差距的，完全不是一个类型的电影，没有需要感恩国家感恩政府感恩党的意思。
chunks.en: It's still very different from Wolf Warrior and The Battle at Lake Changjin. They are completely different types of movies, and there is no need to be grateful to the country, the government, or the Party.

chunks.zh: 说没看过才是政治正确是吧我三刷了，是不是得跪下来请罪？
chunks.en: Saying you haven't seen it is politically correct, right? I've watched it three times, do I have to kneel down and beg for forgiveness?

chunks.zh: 几年没进电影院了
chunks.en: Haven't been to the cinema for years.

chunks.zh: 特意把大家叫出来就为了这点事啊.jpg
chunks.en: You called everyone out here just for this? .jpg

chunks.zh: 看了，好看，不知道这么多人阴阳什么
chunks.en: I watched it, it's good, I don't know what so many people are being sarcastic about.

chunks.zh: 可以看一下 其实我看到时候完全不知道票房已经很高了怎么说呢，也没人说不看不是中国人，就是好东西给大家推荐下
chunks.en: You can take a look. Actually, when I saw it, I didn't know the box office was already so high. How should I put it, no one said that not watching it means you aren't Chinese, it's just a good thing to recommend to everyone.

chunks.zh: 不知道还有没有人记得 2009 年的李献计历险记和饺子的打个大西瓜。
chunks.en: I wonder if anyone still remembers Li Xianji's Adventure and Jiaozi's A Great Radish from 2009.

chunks.zh: 因为这个导演所以去电影院看了哪吒 1 ，老实讲平平无奇，当作支持国产吧。
chunks.en: Because of this director, I went to the cinema to watch Nezha 1. To be honest, it was mediocre, just consider it supporting domestic production.

chunks.zh: 还有就是我现在对哪吒 1 唯一印象就是主角哪吒的配音实在太恶欣赏不来。
chunks.en: Also, my only impression of Nezha 1 now is that the voice acting of the main character Nezha is really too bad to appreciate.

chunks.zh: 今年有国内各种炒作哪吒 2 污染我的时间线，让我看到一条莫名奇妙的用炒作新闻说哪吒 2 被国外禁了。
chunks.en: This year, various domestic hype about Nezha 2 polluted my timeline, and I saw a bizarre piece of news saying that Nezha 2 was banned abroad.

chunks.zh: 给让我看问号了，后来稍微 fact check 了下，果不其然是谣言，疑似是为了炒作影片内容里有嘲讽漂亮国的桥段。
chunks.en: It made me wonder, so I did a little fact check, and sure enough, it was a rumor, suspected to be to hype the film's content that satirizes the US.

chunks.zh: 哈哈，不是说不能讽刺大漂亮，而是说北韩讽刺南韩着实让人难崩。
chunks.en: Haha, it's not that you can't satirize America, but it's really hard to watch North Korea satirizing South Korea.

chunks.zh: @hami1991 笑死 中国人是没了 2019 年 12 月 1 日-2022 年 11 月底的记忆了吗
chunks.en: @hami1991 LOL, have Chinese people lost their memory of December 1, 2019 - the end of November 2022?

chunks.zh: 不是，不在国内，对电影放完所有人起立鼓掌没有兴趣。
chunks.en: No, I'm not in China, and I'm not interested in everyone standing up and applauding after the movie.

chunks.zh: 其他电影有看，但是主要是在线串流服务 / 盗版
chunks.en: I watch other movies, but mainly through online streaming services / piracy.

chunks.zh: 我也没看，今年没去电影院
chunks.en: I haven't watched it either, I haven't been to the cinema this year.

chunks.zh: 看过，感觉很平常，这么高的票房让我害怕😱
chunks.en: I watched it, it felt very ordinary, the high box office scares me 😱.

chunks.zh: 我是不打算看，画风太丑。
chunks.en: I don't plan to watch it, the art style is too ugly.

chunks.zh: 然后孩子寒假，得看一场电影吧，于是本来打算买票了，发现爆满，价格还贵。
chunks.en: Then, it's my child's winter vacation, and we have to watch a movie, so I originally planned to buy tickets, but I found it was full and the price was expensive.

chunks.zh: 日常看电影价格 40 ，影厅也没几个人，那体验还行，哪怕电影差点也没事。
chunks.en: The usual movie price is 40, and there are not many people in the theater, so the experience is okay, even if the movie is not great.

chunks.zh: 这次价格还贵，还爆满，算了，不看了。
chunks.en: This time the price is even more expensive, and it's full, so forget it, I won't watch it.
